actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 601 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to summarily deactivate emergency locator transmitters on aircraft.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation, under the Federal Aviation Act, to summarily deactivate emergency locator transmitters on civil aircraft, when, in the opinion of the Secretary, such activated device interferes with air commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 601 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to summarily deactivate emergency locator transmitters on aircraft.
